title: Adjust right-to-left track title marquee speed

requirements.text: Adjust the scrolling speed of the right-to-left track title marquee so it scrolls at the new desired rate across the app (Mini Player and Now Playing screen). Update the default `speedPxPerSecond` used by `TrackTitleMarquee` and ensure the resulting animation duration changes accordingly while keeping the direction right-to-left.

quotes: Now adjust the speed for the audio text to marque right to left.

acceptanceCriteria: When a long track title overflows, the marquee scrolls right-to-left at the updated speed (visibly different from the previous speed).
Both `NowPlayingScreen` and `MiniPlayer` use the same updated marquee speed behavior.
Reduced-motion preference still disables the marquee animation.
The marquee continues to calculate duration from `totalDistance / speedPxPerSecond` and stays within the existing duration clamp (3sâ€“30s).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the marquee direction right-to-left (do not revert to left-to-right).
nonGoals: Adding a new user-facing settings control for marquee speed.
Changing any backend behavior or data models.
